content.raw:
The acoustic-pinger branch is a bit experimental at this point.  @JonathanWheare is working on integrating the acoustic pinger functionality (range, bearing, elevation measuremements) - but it is still a work in progress.

That being said, I just verified that when I work in the acoustic-pinger branch to run the example I see the publications on the topic...

```
rostopic echo /range_bearing 
layout: 
  dim: 
    - 
      label: "x"
      size: 3
      stride: 1
  data_offset: 0
data: [-0.16476808488368988, -0.6153736114501953, 0.16411180794239044]
```

One thing you might verify is that you have the most recent commits on the branch...

```
hg pull && hg update acoustic-pinger
```

We hope to have this working with the WAM-V - including some tutorials - very soon.
